Sentence: Two men, Vladimir and Estragon, meet near a tree
He (man) pauses for a while to converse with Vladimir and Estragon
After his (Vladimir) departure, Vladimir and Estragon decide to leave, but they do not move as the curtain falls
The next night, Vladimir and Estragon again meet near the tree to wait for Godot
They leave and Vladimir and Estragon continue to wait
After he (Vladimir) leaves, Estragon and Vladimir decide to leave, but again they do not move as the curtain falls, ending the play
